title: Performer Plus
description: A software platform designed to assist employers in managing workplace risks, injuries, and diseases. As the sole front-end developer, I was responsible for building the user interface from scratch. I also contributed to the back-end development and helped plan the overall architecture of the application.

title: Barracks
description: A passion project I built from the ground up. This web-based app provides an intuitive and convenient platform for two essential aspects of the table-top game Bolt Action: rules references and army list building.

title: Matter
description: A personal collection of reusable React components that I've developed to streamline my own development process when working on passion projects.
